---
title: Contacts and credits
---

If you have any questions, feedback or suggested topics for training (including bespoke training sessions), please contact us at: [jgi-training@bristol.ac.uk](mailto:jgi-training@bristol.ac.uk){.nobreak}.

These courses are maintained and delivered by the teams at the University of Bristol's [Jean Golding Institute](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/golding/) and the [Advanced Computing Research Centre](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/acrc/).

Many of the courses were originally developed by members of the University of Bristol's Research Software Engineering group, with special thanks to [Christopher Woods](https://chryswoods.com/), [Matt Williams](https://milliams.com/) and [Al Tanner](https://github.com/altanner).
